GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
clk: qcom: ipq8074: fix PCI-E clock oops

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit d02b3d4a8c525068bc5cfb4341e0023d8eb82ace, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit f0cfcf1ade201dcfd3365f231efc90e846fa46df. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: clk: qcom: ipq8074: fix PCI-E clock oops
